title: Elements card
data:
***Version [0.27](/0.27 "0.27")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                      |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | The card depicts the figures of great beasts lurking in a sandstorm.Drawing this card will summon three beasts of the four elements. |

The Elements card summons natural creatures with some elemental ties. Three out of the four elements will be represented in each draw, and the beasts chosen scales with card power level:

|               | Fire                                                                                                                                              | Ice                                                                                                                 | Air                                                                                                                                   | Earth                                                                                                               |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Power level 0 | v [![Fire vortex.png](/images/8/8a/Fire_vortex.png)](/File:Fire_vortex.png) **[Fire vortex](/Fire_vortex "Fire vortex")**                         | Y [![Ice beast.png](/images/0/02/Ice_beast.png)](/File:Ice_beast.png) **[Ice beast](/Ice_beast "Ice beast")**       | h [![Raiju.png](/images/0/0d/Raiju.png)](/File:Raiju.png) **[Raiju](/Raiju "Raiju")**                                                 | l [![Basilisk.png](/images/b/b1/Basilisk.png)](/File:Basilisk.png) **[Basilisk](/Basilisk "Basilisk")**             |
| Power level 1 | 9 [![Molten gargoyle.png](/images/f/f9/Molten_gargoyle.png)](/File:Molten_gargoyle.png) **[Molten gargoyle](/Molten_gargoyle "Molten gargoyle")** | h [![Polar bear.png](/images/1/1a/Polar_bear.png)](/File:Polar_bear.png) **[Polar bear](/Polar_bear "Polar bear")** | k [![Wind drake.png](/images/b/b7/Wind_drake.png)](/File:Wind_drake.png) **[Wind drake](/Wind_drake "Wind drake")**                   | Y [![Catoblepas.png](/images/3/3b/Catoblepas.png)](/File:Catoblepas.png) **[Catoblepas](/Catoblepas "Catoblepas")** |
| Power level 2 | D [![Fire dragon.png](/images/2/2b/Fire_dragon.png)](/File:Fire_dragon.png) **[Fire dragon](/Fire_dragon "Fire dragon")**                         | D [![Ice dragon.png](/images/6/6f/Ice_dragon.png)](/File:Ice_dragon.png) **[Ice dragon](/Ice_dragon "Ice dragon")** | S [![Shock serpent.png](/images/8/81/Shock_serpent.png)](/File:Shock_serpent.png) **[Shock serpent](/Shock_serpent "Shock serpent")** | 9 [![Iron golem.png](/images/e/ed/Iron_golem.png)](/File:Iron_golem.png) **[Iron golem](/Iron_golem "Iron golem")** |

It can be found in the [deck of summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning").

## History

- In [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), the [mottled dragon](/Mottled_dragon "Mottled dragon") was replaced with a [rime drake](/Rime_drake "Rime drake").
- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), the [boulder beetle](/Boulder_beetle "Boulder beetle") was replaced with a [catoblepas](/Catoblepas "Catoblepas"). Also the Elements card was one of only 23 cards to be kept as decks were simplified.
- In [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), the [salamander firebrand](/Salamander_firebrand "Salamander firebrand") was replaced with a [fire dragon](/Fire_dragon "Fire dragon").
- The Elements card was added in [0.16](/0.16 "0.16") as a replacement of the eliminated [the Herd](/Herd_card "Herd card") card.

## See also

- [Cards](/Cards "Cards")
- [Decks](/Decks "Decks")

| [Deck of escape](/Deck_of_escape "Deck of escape")                | [The Cloud](/Cloud_card "Cloud card") • [The Elixir](/Elixir_card "Elixir card") • [Exile](/Exile_card "Exile card") • [The Tomb](/Tomb_card "Tomb card") • [Velocity](/Velocity_card "Velocity card")                                                         |
| [Deck of summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning")       | [The Dance](/Dance_card "Dance card") • [The Elements]() • [The Illusion](/Illusion_card "Illusion card") • [The Swarm](/Swarm_card "Swarm card") • [The Pentagram](/Pentagram_card "Pentagram card") • [The Rangers](/Rangers_card "Rangers card")            |
| [Deck of punishment](/Deck_of_punishment "Deck of punishment")    | [Swine](/Swine_card "Swine card") • [Torment](/Torment_card "Torment card") • [Wraith](/Wraith_card "Wraith card") • [Wrath](/Wrath_card "Wrath card")                                                                                                         |
html:
Elements card

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.27: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
The card depicts the figures of great beasts lurking in a sandstorm.

Drawing this card will summon three beasts of the four elements.

The Elements card summons natural creatures with some elemental ties. Three out of the four elements will be represented in each draw, and the beasts chosen scales with card power level:

Fire Ice Air Earth
Power level 0 v Fire vortex Y Ice beast h Raiju l Basilisk
Power level 1 9 Molten gargoyle h Polar bear k Wind drake Y Catoblepas
Power level 2 D Fire dragon D Ice dragon S Shock serpent 9 Iron golem

It can be found in the deck of summoning.

History

  • In 0.20, the mottled dragon was replaced with a rime drake.
  • In 0.19, the boulder beetle was replaced with a catoblepas. Also the Elements card was one of only 23 cards to be kept as decks were simplified.
  • In 0.18, the salamander firebrand was replaced with a fire dragon.
  • The Elements card was added in 0.16 as a replacement of the eliminated the Herd card.

  • Decks

Deck of escape The Cloud • The Elixir • Exile • The Tomb • Velocity
Deck of summoning The Dance • The Elements • The Illusion • The Swarm • The Pentagram • The Rangers
Deck of punishment Swine • Torment • Wraith • Wrath
